Body:
Antonia wants to salute the teams who are competing at the State UIL Meet this year.

She has created a message: "BRAVO UIL COMPSCI"

She would like to print it in a very specific way. Each letter is on a different line and is printed in uppercase letters. Each letter
will appear the same number of times as its position in the alphabet. An "A" would be printed once, a "B" would be printed two
times ... a "Z" would be printed 26 times. Empty lines separate the words.

Help Antonia print her cool message.
Output: The message as shown below along left edge of screen. Notice the two empty lines.
